help-file.title: "GOD, ACCEPT" "GOD, DECLINE"
help-file.content:
Syntax: accept <charname|on|off> decline <player> [<reason>]
These commands let you accept or decline potential character's names, dependent on whether they meet up to the standards set forth in the introduction at new character creation. "accept off" turns this acception/ decline mode off, and simply allows new characters to log on without a god's permission.
